text: The Murderers are Coming () is a 1942 Soviet war movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin and Yuri Tarich.УБИЙЦЫ ВЫХОДЯТ НА ДОРОГУВ рамках фестиваля "Короткие встречи" в Германии покажут две программы советского кино The movie is based on the 1938 play Fear and Misery of the Third Reich by Bertolt Brecht. It stars Mikhail Astangov, Boris Blinov, and Sofiya Magarill. ==Actors== * Mikhail Astangov - Franz * Boris Blinov - Theo * Sofiya Magarill * Ada Vojtsik - Marta * Oleg Zhakov * Olga Zhiznyeva - Clara == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1942 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies directed by Yuri Tarich
title: The Murderers are Coming
